name: bicentennial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the day or year that is 200 years after a particular event, especially an important one: A statue was erected to mark the bicentennial of the composer's birth. bicentennial celebrations

Add to word list
the day or year that is 200 years after a particular event, esp. an important one; a 200th anniversary: The university marked its bicentennial with a weeklong celebration.
